localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Booste APIs boiling all the pains of the production ML stack into a single line of code. We're super excited to launch an API to OpenAI's powerful new no-training-needed image classifier to Python and Node. Give it a spin!
blogPost.body: Booste APIs boiling all the pains of the production ML stack into a single line of code. We're super excited to launch an API to OpenAI's powerful new no-training-needed image classifier to Python and Node. Give it a spin!
blogPost.title: CLIP API by Booste - Use OpenAI's newest image classifier with one line of code.
blogPost.author: Erik Dunteman

localize.description: Booste APIs将生产ML堆栈的所有痛苦归结为一行代码。我们非常兴奋地推出了OpenAI强大的新的无需训练的图像分类器的API到Python和Node。快来试试吧
localize.tagline: 使用OpenAI最新的图像分类器，只需一行代码。

localize.description: Booste APIs將生產ML堆棧的所有痛苦歸結爲一行代碼。我們非常興奮地推出了OpenAI強大的新的無需訓練的圖像分類器的API到Python和Node。快來試試吧
localize.tagline: 使用OpenAI最新的圖像分類器，只需一行代碼。

previous.excerpt: Zoho Mail Bookmarks is integrated with your Zoho Inbox and can be accessed from anywhere. With this plugin, you can easily save any URL/ link to your Zoho Mail Bookmarks for your personal reference or to share with your team.
previous.title: Zoho Mail Bookmarks - Save any URL link from your browser

localize.description: Zoho邮件书签与您的Zoho收件箱集成，可以从任何地方访问。有了这个插件，您可以轻松地将任何URL/链接保存到您的Zoho邮件书签中，供您个人参考或与您的团队分享。
localize.tagline: 从浏览器中保存任何URL链接

localize.description: Zoho郵件書籤與您的Zoho收件箱集成，可以從任何地方訪問。有了這個插件，您可以輕鬆地將任何URL/鏈接保存到您的Zoho郵件書籤中，供您個人參考或與您的團隊分享。
localize.tagline: 從瀏覽器中保存任何URL鏈接

next.excerpt: Prefix helps your business get started with RPA without expensive implementation partners. Automate repetitive work on web and desktop apps that don't have API’s or clean software integrations, and save your team valuable time.
next.title: Prefix - Build custom computer automations anywhere

localize.description: Prefix帮助您的企业开始使用RPA，而无需昂贵的实施伙伴。在没有API或干净的软件集成的Web和桌面应用程序上自动完成重复性工作，并为您的团队节省宝贵的时间。
localize.tagline: 在任何地方建立自定义的计算机自动化系统

localize.description: Prefix幫助您的企業開始使用RPA，而無需昂貴的實施夥伴。在沒有API或乾淨的軟件集成的Web和桌面應用程序上自動完成重複性工作，併爲您的團隊節省寶貴的時間。
localize.tagline: 在任何地方建立自定義的計算機自動化系統
